name: @dendronhq/remark-mermaid
description: A remark plugin for Markdown that replaces `mermaid` graphs with rendered SVGs.

scripts.test:coverage: npm run teardown && $(npm bin)/jest --coverage --coverageReporters text text-summary
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.version: version-changelog CHANGELOG.md && changelog-verify CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
